thread.title: Oregon releases 5,000 emails to, from former governor
thread.title_full: Oregon releases 5,000 emails to, from former governor

author: The Associated Press
title: Oregon releases 5,000 emails to, from former governor
text:
Oregon releases 5,000 emails to, from former governor The Associated Press Order Reprint of this Story SALEM, Ore. 
The Oregon governor's office has released 5,000 emails from an account used by former Gov. John Kitzhaber for official business before he resigned in an influence-peddling scandal. 
Some of the emails released Tuesday show Kitzhaber's fianc√©e, Cylvia Hayes, weighing in on environmental policy matters, such as crafting a 10-year energy plan and discussions of coal exports. 
Kitzhaber stepped down in February amid allegations that used the governor's office to win contracts for her green-energy consulting business. 
Gov. Kate Brown's office says that 12,000 emails from Kitzhaber's account have yet to be reviewed for public release. 
Emails from a separate account that Kitzhaber used for private business are not included in the release. Those emails were archived inadvertently on state servers, and Kitzhaber's lawyers are fighting to keep them private. Related content
